org.gbif.utils

Class HttpUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.utils.HttpUtil

  • public class HttpUtil
extends Object
    A utility class for HTTP related functions.

    This class itself is thread safe. If you require thread safety please make sure to use a thread safe http client as the underlying client. The ones created here in the static builder methods or via the default constructor are.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HttpUtil.Response
      An HttpResponse wrapper exposing limited fields.

      • map2Entity

        public static org.apache.http.HttpEntity map2Entity(String key,
                                                    String data)
        Creates a url form encoded http entity suitable for POST requests with a single given parameter encoded in utf8.
        Parameters:
        key - the parameter name
        data - the value to encode

      • newMultithreadedClient

        public static org.apache.http.impl.client.DefaultHttpClient newMultithreadedClient(int timeout,
                                                                                   int maxConnections,
                                                                                   int maxPerRoute)
        This creates a new threadsafe, multithreaded http client with support for http and https. Default http client values are partially overriden to use UTF8 as the default charset and an explicit timeout is required for configuration.
        Parameters:
        timeout - in milliseconds
        maxConnections - maximum allowed connections in total
        maxPerRoute - maximum allowed connections per route

      • parseHeaderDate

        public static Date parseHeaderDate(String rfcDate)
        Parses a RFC2616 compliant date string such as used in http headers.
        Parameters:
        rfcDate - RFC2616 compliant date string
        Returns:
        the parsed date or null if it cannot be parsed
        See Also:
        RFC 2616 specification. example: Wed, 21 Jul 2010 22:37:31 GMT

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • downloadIfChanged

        public boolean downloadIfChanged(URL url,
                                 Date lastModified,
                                 File downloadTo)
                          throws IOException
        Downloads a url to a file if its modified since the date given. Updates the last modified file property to reflect the last servers modified http header.
        Parameters:
        downloadTo - file to download to
        Returns:
        true if changed or false if unmodified since lastModified
        Throws:
        IOException

      • downloadIfChanged

        public boolean downloadIfChanged(URL url,
                                 File downloadTo)
                          throws IOException
        Downloads a url to a local file using conditional GET, i.e. only downloading the file again if it has been changed since the last download.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • downloadIfModifiedSince

        public org.apache.http.StatusLine downloadIfModifiedSince(URL url,
                                                          Date lastModified,
                                                          File downloadTo)
                                                   throws IOException
        Downloads a url to a file if its modified since the date given. Updates the last modified file property to reflect the last servers modified http header.
        Parameters:
        downloadTo - file to download to
        Returns:
        true if changed or false if unmodified since lastModified
        Throws:
        IOException

      • downloadIfModifiedSince

        public org.apache.http.StatusLine downloadIfModifiedSince(URL url,
                                                          File downloadTo)
                                                   throws IOException
        Downloads a url to a local file using conditional GET, i.e. only downloading the file again if it has been changed on the filesystem since the last download.
        Parameters:
        url - url to download
        downloadTo - file to download into and used to get the last modified date from
        Throws:
        IOException
